rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2628, 2630, 3478, 3481, P3001})
Must be enrolled in course version {2628, 2630, 3478}

description: This unit covers the principles of the: Management of mental health disorders to ensure optimal treatment for patients Chemistry, pharmacology and clinical aspects of medications used for mental health disorders. These as well as pathophysiology of mental health disorders are presented in an integrated fashion Necessary skills required for the provision of pharmacy services in mental health
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
